content: DSH 900-X 14” Gas cut-off saw Powerful, easy-start 87 cc gas cut-off saw with auto-choke – max. blade diameter 14” for cutting depth up to 5” ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Concrete saws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Powerful 14” cut-off saw engineered to make your most demanding cutting work quicker and easier – even floor sawing using the optional DSH-FSC floor cart Easy-start gas saw – unique auto-choke helps to make first-pull ignition the norm, and flooded engines virtually impossible Durable build – reinforced metal blade guard and longer-lasting internal components help you power through the job with fewer interruptions Easier, self-service maintenance – pre-tensioned belt and virtually unbreakable starter rope help to minimize the saws maintenance downtime Compatible with the DSH-P water pump – feeds water to your gas saw from any source, no pressurization needed Applications Road construction – perimeter cutting in asphalt and concrete Sewage work – cutting metal, concrete and plastic pipes Concrete and masonry construction – cutting expansion joints in fresh concrete and openings in brick or concrete walls Laying paving – cutting curbstones and paving slabs to size Metalwork – cutting steel profiles, pipes and steel sheets ### TECHNICAL DATA: Motor cylinder: 87 cm³ Rated power: 4.3 kW Wet or dry operation: Wet and Dry Technical Data | Motor cylinder | 87 cm³ | Rated power | 4.3 kW | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 31.8 x 10.3 x 17.1 in | Fuel mixture | 50:1 (2% oil) | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 102 dB (A) | 1 | Disc diameter | 14 in | Cutting depth | 5 in | Triaxial vibration value for cutting concrete slab (ah) | 6.3 m/s² | 2 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3628977 - DSH 900-X 14 Pallet (8) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 8x DSH 900-X 14 Hand-held gas saw - 3538891 - 14, DSH900-X + 1SPX Diamond Blade - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 900-X 14 Hand-held gas saw - 1x Cutting Disc EQD SPX 14x1 univ. - 3538892 - 14, DSH900-X + 2SP Diamond Blades - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 900-X 14 Hand-held gas saw - 2x Cutting disc SP-S 14x1 universal - 3539183 - 14, DSH900-X + 3P Diamond Blades - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 900-X 14 Hand-held gas saw - 3x Cutting disc P-S 14/1 - 3539184 - 14, DSH900-X + 10 Abrasive Blades - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 900-X 14 Hand-held gas saw - 10x Cutting disc 14x5/32x20 MD SPX - 2265865 - DSH 900-X 14 Gen.3 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 900-X 14 Hand-held gas saw
